mapper.select: SELECT id, title, owner_id AS ownerId, -- 数据库owner_id → 实体类ownerId content AS content, -- 数据库content → 实体类content minio_key AS minioKey, -- 数据库minio_key → 实体类minioKey category AS category, tags AS tags, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_document WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} ORDER BY update_time DESC
